name: Baked Veggie Curry Casserole
description: Up your weeknight dinner casserole with this easy vegan vegetable curry casserole loaded with Indian spices and creamy tomato gravy! All in 1 dish!
recipeIngredient: Lemon Juice and cilantro for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil to a baking dish, a 7x11 inch baking dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oil to a baking dish, a 7x11 inch baking dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spices and mix. Add in the onion, garlic, green chili, and a good pinch of salt, and mix it, and spread out.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spices and mix. Add in the onion, garlic, green chili, and a good pinch of salt, and mix it, and spread out.

recipeInstructions.text: Put the baking dish in the oven at 400 degrees F for about 7-9 minutes, or until the onions are starting to turn golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Put the baking dish in the oven at 400 degrees F for about 7-9 minutes, or until the onions are starting to turn golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the dish out from the oven and add in the tomato puree, nondairy milk, and salt, and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the dish out from the oven and add in the tomato puree, nondairy milk, and salt, and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the vegetables, and mix well to coat, and put the dish back in the oven to bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the vegetables are done to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the vegetables, and mix well to coat, and put the dish back in the oven to bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the vegetables are done to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the dish out of the oven, add a drizzle of lemon juice, and chopped cilantro for garnish. You can add in some pepper flakes as well. Serve it with some flat bread, or over rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the dish out of the oven, add a drizzle of lemon juice, and chopped cilantro for garnish. You can add in some pepper flakes as well. Serve it with some flat bread, or over rice.
